name: Golf Up
description:
- CONTROLS - 
Left Jump - Click left of screen or Left Arrow Key
Right Jump - Click right of screen or Right Arrow Key
Up Jump - Click middle of screen or Up Arrow Key

Climb high in this frustratingly difficult golf platform game, but be careful not to fall! Jump as high as you can and become the king of the leaderboards.

Explore the relaxing and beautiful world of Golf Up. Use your skill and timing to avoid traps, and see if you can set the multiplayer high score. 

Golf Up features bright and colorful level design influenced by platform classic such as Jump King and Getting Over It With Bennet Foddy. 

Download from Google Play to access:

> Global Highscores
> Social Sharing
> Frustratingly difficult gameplay.
> Easy to play one tap controls.

Challenge your friends and see who can climb the fastest.
